plot: Five kids take you behind the scenes of Disney's biggest productions and creations including movies, music videos, theme parks and video games and show you how it's all done.
plot_en: Five kids take you behind the scenes of Disney's biggest productions and creations including movies, music videos, theme parks and video games and show you how it's all done.
plot_es: Five kids take you behind the scenes of Disney's biggest productions and creations including movies, music videos, theme parks and video games and show you how it's all done.
title: Movie Surfers
